idea-plugin.name: Actions Java
idea-plugin.description:
You can invoke these actions via IntelliJ's "Find Action" or "Search Everything" functionality, you can also assign keyboard shortcuts to them under Preferences | Keymap | Plug-ins | Actions.

Structural editing:
  • Kill to Code End: Kill from caret offset to the end of the code block, statement, method etc.

action.description: Kill the code block after cursor, if no code block, kill to line end.
